programme.title: Bob Dole and the fall of Rome
programme.short_synopsis: How does modern-day America compare with the fall of Rome as described by Gibbon?
programme.medium_synopsis: The work of historian Edward Gibbon, the parallels between modern-day America and the fall of Rome, and Bob Dole's credentials as a presidential candidate.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: Bob Dole and the fall of Rome

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
